title: After Hemnet & Blocket: The New Portal for Swedish Property Buyers in Spain
excerpt: Hemnet and Blocket don't cover Spanish properties. Learn about new portals, agencies, and resources created specifically for Swedish buyers searching for homes in Spain.
author: New Build Homes Costa Blanca
